ASE Assignment

Class AppElse

Namespace
ASE_Assignment
Assembly
ASE Assignment.dll

Represents an "else" conditional command in the program. This command is part of compound commands and provides branching logic based on conditions.

public class AppElse : AppCompoundCommand, ICommand
